flow.userIntent: Understand what Nutstash is and decide whether to try it
exitPoints: Navigation to Nuts, Why, Features, FAQs, Help, Code sections

interactiveElements.action: Scroll to or navigate to relevant sections

flow.informationArchitecture: Hero-driven layout: value proposition (headline) → explanation (subtext) → dual CTAs → device mockup provides visual context
frictionPoints: No immediate benefit statement in headline—requires reading subtext
Two competing CTAs might confuse first-time users

copy.headline: Hide your Nuts.
copy.subheadline: Nutstash is an ecash wallet for your browser on any device. It uses the cashu ecash protocol to offer a digital cash-like experience.

ctas.text: Try Nutstash
Check the Code
Open Wallet

components.description: Nutstash wordmark with pixelated cat
Horizontal menu bar
iPhone frame with purple gradient interior

copy.headline: Hide your Nuts.
copy.subheadline: Nutstash is an ecash wallet for your browser on any device. It uses the cashu ecash protocol to offer a digital cash-like experience.

ctas.text: Try Nutstash
Check the Code

typography.headingStyle: Large bold italic serif (40px+), magenta/pink color

components.description: Dropdown with English flag
Yellow/orange warning icon + text on dark background
components.notable: High contrast warning color grabs attention

components.description: Pixelated cat in pink/purple square
components.notable: Smaller than landing page; vertically centered

components.description: Centered white button on dark background
components.notable: Clean, minimal button styling

design.visualHierarchy: Top: warning → center: mascot + welcome text → bottom: CTA button. Vertical centering emphasizes modal dialog
innovativeElements: Centered modal layout breaks from split-panel of previous screens
Warning banner uses color strategically to build trust

flow.userIntent: Review key information about Nutstash before accessing wallet

interactiveElements.action: Closes modal and proceeds to wallet interface
Opens FAQs page in new tab

flow.informationArchitecture: Modal overlay with stacked info: warning banner → logo/mascot → headline → body paragraphs → link to FAQs → action button
frictionPoints: Dense text block may deter users—three paragraphs without visual breaks
No 'Cancel' or close button visible; only OK to proceed

ctas.text: OK

microcopy.text: Nutstash is still in beta development. Please use at own risk.
Nutstash is a Cashu ecash wallet.
Ecash works without accounts. Cashu tokens are bearer assets, that are stored locally on your nutstash wallet.
Nutstash is NOT the custodian. The custodian of your sats are the mints you choose to connect to.
for more information, please visit FAQs
